name: Impasse War Survival Shooting
description:
You are the Survival in Impasse war! Its time to show your power. Defeat your intruders to clear your land and Keep an eye on upcoming descendants. Shoot to Kill up to Dozens, Hundreds and Thousands. It depends on your shooting skills.

The time is moving so fast, you are in the world of indecent Zombies & They want to occupy all over the world!. Attackers came with a complete mission to ruin the world and take control on it. You have a team to fight with these aggressors. Take the powerful weapons and shoot the evils. It’s up to you save your world from the decedent.

People are in horrifying trouble. Let's shoot dreadful zombies. Just choose a combat weapon and start a battle against the menacing shooter in a terrifying world!

Can you survive in this shooting world? It's Not just a Game. This Is Battle in Impasse War Survival Shooting. Let's Assault on the Enemy to smash them ALL!
